GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE HOUSING UTILITIES MEDICAL OTHER

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.ValuationMethodUsedDesc: AVERAGE COST PER POUND FOR DONATED FOOD

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: RESTORATION CENTER PROVIDES FOOD CLOTHING AND TOILETRIES TO LOW-INCOME AND HOMELESS FAMILIES AND INDIVIDUALS. EACH FAMILY OR INDIVIDUAL COMPLETES A BASIC APPLICATION INCLUDING INFORMATION ABOUT INCOME AND ANY OTHER ASSISTANCE RECEIVED. RESTORATION CENTER ALSO HOLDS A MONTHLY MOBILE FOOD PANTRY TO DISBURSE FOOD DONATED BY THE TARRANT AREA FOOD BANK. TO RECEIVE FOOD FROM THE MOBILE PANTRY INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES MUST COMPLETE AN APPLICATION PROVIDED BY THE FOOD BANK INCLUDING INFORMATION ABOUT OTHER ASSISTANCE RECEIVED INCOME AND EMERGENCY SITUATIONS. IN ADDITION TO FOOD DISTRIBUTION RESTORATION CENTER PROVIDES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FOR HOUSING UTILITIES AND OTHER MISC. BASIC NEEDS. TO RECEIVE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FAMILIES AND INDIVIDUALS MUST COMPLETE AN APPLICATION AND INTERVIEW AND THE HOUSING LANDLORD MUST ALSO BE INTERVIEWED TO DETERMINE ELIGIBILITY. HOUSING ASSISTANCE IS PAID DIRECTLY TO THE LANDLORD AND UTILITY ASSISTANCE IS PAID DIRECTLY TO THE UTILITY COMPANY.

FoodInventoryGrp.MethodOfDeterminingRevenuesTxt: AVERAGE COST PER POUND PER FEEDING AMERICA

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WE RECENTLY DISCOVERED THAT OUR TAX RETURNS HAVE BEEN INCORRECT SINCE 2019. WE ARE FILING AMENDMENTS FOR YEARS 2019 2020 2021 AND 2022. WE HIRED A NEW CPA WITH KNOWLEDGE OF NONPROFITS TO ENSURE OUR TAX FILINGS ARE CORRECT GOING FORWARD.
THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS THE DRAFT OF FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING AND HAS THE OPPORTUNITY TO PROVIDE COMMENTARY AND QUESTIONS.
THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS DICSUSSED ANNUALLY AT BOARD MEETINGS.
THE SALARIES OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND OTHER EMPLOYEES ARE DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND BASED ON COMPARABILITY DATA OF SIMILAR LOCAL ORGANIZATIONS.
ALL DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AND CAN BE VIEWED AT THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICE.
